mapper.insert: Insert into member( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_ADDRESS, SALT ) values( #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{memberNo}, #{address}, #{salt} )
mapper.select: select MEMBER_ID as memberId, MEMBER_PWD as memberPwd, MEMBER_NAME as memberName, NICKNAME, PHONE, MEMBER_NUMBER as memberNo, MEMBER_ADDRESS as address, SALT from member where MEMBER_ID = #{userId}
